code.installcode: $db->hide_errors(); $vbulletin->db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "votes ( `targetid` int(11) NOT NULL, `targettype` enum('forum','sg') NOT NULL, `vote` enum('1','-1') NOT NULL, `fromuserid` int(11) NOT NULL, `touserid` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`targetid`, `targettype`, `vote`, `fromuserid`), KEY `given_votes` (`fromuserid`, `targettype`, `vote`), KEY `received_votes` (`touserid`, `targettype`, `vote`), KEY `votes_per_day` (`fromuserid`, `date`), KEY `date` (`date`, `vote`, `targettype`, `targetid`) )"); $db->query_write("ALTER TABLE " . TABLE_PREFIX . "user ADD INDEX `user_name` ( `userid` , `username` ) "); $db->show_errors();

templates.template:
<style type="text/css">
.postbitlegacy .postfoot .textcontrols a.votepos, .postbit .postfoot .textcontrols a.votepos  {
	background: url({vb:stylevar imgdir_button}/vote_pos.png) no-repeat {vb:stylevar postbit_control_background} {vb:stylevar left};
	padding: {vb:stylevar postbit_control_padding};
	padding-{vb:stylevar left}: {vb:math {vb:stylevar postbit_control_padding}+20};
	border: {vb:stylevar postbit_control_border};
}
.postbitlegacy .postfoot .textcontrols a.votepos:hover, .postbit .postfoot .textcontrols a.votepos:hover  {
	background: url({vb:stylevar imgdir_button}/vote_pos-hover.png) no-repeat {vb:stylevar postbit_control_hover_background} {vb:stylevar left};
	padding: {vb:stylevar postbit_control_padding};
	padding-{vb:stylevar left}: {vb:math {vb:stylevar postbit_control_padding}+20};
	border: {vb:stylevar postbit_control_hover_border};
}

.postbitlegacy .postfoot .textcontrols a.voteneg, .postbit .postfoot .textcontrols a.voteneg  {
	background: url({vb:stylevar imgdir_button}/vote_neg.png) no-repeat {vb:stylevar postbit_control_background} {vb:stylevar left};
	padding: {vb:stylevar postbit_control_padding};
	padding-{vb:stylevar left}: {vb:math {vb:stylevar postbit_control_padding}+20};
	border: {vb:stylevar postbit_control_border};
}
.postbitlegacy .postfoot .textcontrols a.voteneg:hover, .postbit .postfoot .textcontrols a.voteneg:hover  {
	background: url({vb:stylevar imgdir_button}/vote_neg-hover.png) no-repeat {vb:stylevar postbit_control_hover_background} {vb:stylevar left};
	padding: {vb:stylevar postbit_control_padding};
	padding-{vb:stylevar left}: {vb:math {vb:stylevar postbit_control_padding}+20};
	border: {vb:stylevar postbit_control_hover_border};
}
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">
    <!--
    //Init target type constant
    var VOTE_CONTENT_TYPE = "{vb:raw content_type}";

    // initialize vote buttons and votes result table
    AJAX_PostVote_Init('posts');

    // override PostBit_Init
    Pre_Votes_PostBit_Init = PostBit_Init;
    PostBit_Init = function (obj, post_id)
    {
        if (typeof AJAX_PostVote_Init != "undefined")
        {
            // init vote controls
            AJAX_PostVote_Init(obj, post_id);
        }

        Pre_Votes_PostBit_Init(obj, post_id);
    }
    //-->
</script>

{vb:rawphrase vbv_votes_statistic}
{vb:rawphrase vbv_received_votes}
+ {vb:raw userinfo['received_positive_votes']} / - {vb:raw userinfo['received_negative_votes']} 0
{vb:rawphrase vbv_given_votes}
+ {vb:raw userinfo['given_positive_votes']} / - {vb:raw userinfo['given_negative_votes']} 0

phrasetype.name: Error Messages
phrasetype.phrase: This post is too old to be voted
This content unsupported by Vb Votes system. If you see this message, please contact the administrator.

phrasetype.name: Postbit
phrasetype.phrase: (auto) This post got too many negative votes.

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Allow user to delete his own votes.
If disabled, only positive voting is allowed.
When user goes to this group, all his votes are cleared.
User groups to completely disable mod. Recommended for guests, to keep good SEO rank.
This groups can view votes, but can't make new ones.
Users from this groups can't get votes.
If set YES, then ignored forum IDs will be autocompleted with their childs. It will be enougth to set only forum categories above.
Votes will be disabled for this forums. Place forum IDs, separated by ",". For example "1,2,3"
How many votes user can give per day.
When post get too many negative votes, report to moderators is generated automatically. Set 0 to disable.
After X days all negative votes are completely cleared. Set 0 to keep forever.
This option allows to disable voting for posts, which are older XX days. So, only new posts can be voted. Set '0' to disable limits.
Disable voting if post is X days old
Limit (in days) for "top voted" search. Set 0 disable top links at all.
